name: william barber
text: Well thought out course with multiple options when at each station.  A great time for an outing with friends, family or even a team building exercise with coworkers.  Friendly staff, nice facilities, overall a very pleasant experience.

name: Christo Jewett
text:
Drove down from Georgetown, GA to check out Ravenwood with 2 family members. Was blown away by how nice it was and organized the layout is.... Highly recommend it, they've been up for 5years pace looks new. Reasonably priced as well with an optional Golf cart instead of walking.

Will definitely be coming back with my friends soon!

name: Will Hutcherson
text:
Had a great time shooting clays here! Fun group activity. Very clean and well kept! Staff was attentive and professional.
Pro tip: bring your own ammo to save money.

name: Marie Chafin
text:
We were headed to PCB, FL and knew we had seen this sign on our last trip. So this time we brought our shotgun and stopped in to shoot on a Friday morning
on our way to the beach.

I have to say this facility is top notch and very well staffed. We were treated like old friends and really enjoyed the laid back style and ease of it all. We will definitely be back any time we are headed to/from the beach!

name: Justin Walton
text: It’s a good course, but they do not take care of the equipment.  I now have a really scratched up Citori. The gun straps in the cart are faulty/old. The manager came out and acknowledged that the straps on my cart did not hold. Could pull them open with one finger. Spacers were missing that allowed the gun to fall out. He offered me a credit equal to 15% of my guns value. Gun is beyond repair. I guess it’s off to small claims court. Luckily, my family started recording when I was talking to the manager, and we got some good video of straps not working. Hold your gun when in the carts!

name: Jeff Hawk
text: Awesome course. Great variety of targets, challenging options at each station. I like the different menus offered for each station. Considering all the rain, I was amazed how well groomed the path was. The best I’ve shot in the state.

name: Mark Conner
text: Shot there today July 25 and this is a super course and the friendliest staff you can find. I will shoot there anytime I'm around Dothan.

name: Hunter Olson
text: Great experience. Staff is welcoming and are dedicated to the experience. One of the machines ran out of battery half way through and were out there within a few minutes. We were a group of 9 and spent about 4 hours shooting. Definitely will go again.

name: Sheena Land
text: Love it here. Great place for groups. If you shoot sporting clays regularly I recommend going here because of their deals and the amazing staff along with a beautiful place. It would be a great place for a party if your going to shot afterwards.

name: Jonathan Stevens
text:
We got gift certificates on Father’s Day.  Finally got to go with my dad and two brothers.  I didn’t really know what to expect, man I was blown away.  The place is top notch it was the equivalent of going to a fancy golf course.  Except with guns, so it was better!
Went a second time with my company.  Some of the people didn’t have guns so we rented 2 guns.  One was a 12 gauge over and under.  The other was a 20 gauge berreta, so even the rentals were not low end guns.  Had an excellent time again.  We did have an issue with one of the throwers, but one phone call and Someone was there quickly to take care of it.

name: Mark Beck
text: First class facility and the staff is super!  This is how sporting clays is supposed to be done. Lots of fun!!!

name: Sonali Zeile
text: If I could give this establishment more than 5 stars I absolutely would. Every member of the staff is more than hospitable and an expert in the sport. I took my dad and cousin shooting for the first time, we learned a LOT from Jay about shooting, arranging targets, hunting and more! We all shared an hour lesson, but were only charged for 2 of us. The ammo and pigeons are cheaper than buying them at Dick's (even though the gift shop is overpriced- but hey, it's a giftshop) and Jay even gave us a tour of the 14 stations after our lesson so we could see the different projectiles of targets! Very clean and homely lounge area with firepit, restrooms and kitchen. Would absolutely go back again!

name: Bob Sieben
text: Great course with challenges for every level of shooter.

name: Savannah Shields
text: Very nice place. Golfing with a 12 gauge.

name: Jaime B
text: Beautiful well kept course and facilities.

name: Jim Daughtry
text: Great location with excellent facilities and great staff

name: Jessica Burks
text: Friendly, clean, fun place to be! Challenging course for all skill levels. Plus trap and skeet, it's amazing! Worth the short drive.

name: luke haddix
text: If you like to just go bust some clay targets, this place is the best

name: Anthony Lopez-Montana
text: Friendly, great club atmosphere, conveniently located near the city center great staff. I am a member and love the friends and fellowship with competition. Great place to start learning shotgun sports and wing shooting.  Full complement of skeet trap and sporting clays. Hope to see new faces soon..

name: Nathaniel Burks
text: Amazing place to shoot clays! There's something for all skill levels here. Chris, the owner, is super nice and is willing to give tips to help you improve. Definitely our favorite place to shoot clays and hope to get a membership here soon. This is my place to de-stress and what I look forward to every week

name: albert reese
text: I enjoy this place more than anywhere else . chris, bill and others are very friendly and very helpful. I joined as a member not long after i visited. Fine place

name: Vicki Harris
text: Great place and great people.

name: Biilly Wright
text: Been shooting there for a while.  Good targets. Excellent course.

name: Peter Hansen
text: Very disappointed.  Joined to shoot trap.  Machine has been broke for several months with no information on when the machine will be repaired.  I have several rounds on my payment card.  Obviously that will be my loss.

name: Dena Amison-Middleton
text: Cool place and quiet

name: Brian Presson
text: The Range Masters (staff) are very helpful and attentive when it comes to maintaining a fun yet safe environment for target practicing. Great for individual training as well as for family and friends to attend together. An outdoorsy setting is another remarkable feature, making it one of the best public ranges in Northern Alabama.

name: J C (WhatCanISay?!)
text: When shooting here for the first time and it was great. You have to take a test if you are new to this range, but it was still a good experience!!!

name: Joshua Jamison
text:
I would like to do business here but the web page doesn't have hours of operations.  Got a gun for Christmas and wanted to shoot it today (12/30/2013).  Don't know if I drive up and its open or if I drive up to find a locked gate.  I live an hour away.
Update your web page to at least say "open weekends only" not open during the week, daylight hours.  Cost of usage would also be helpful, what about the type of range you have, skeet, trap, rifle, pistol....Don't know what's up there.

resp.text: We recognize your issues and concerns. A brand new website is in the works and should be live real soon.  It will answer all of the issues that you identified here.  https://mcssa-al.org/

name: Smud ykins
text: Great place to get out and enjoy mother nature.

name: Frank Smith
text: Great place to shoot. Good people who make this a safe shooting environment.

name: Charles Elliott
text: Nice, well run place. Only 4 stars as there is no rifle range.

name: Evans Zander
text: Lots of space and play ground

name: Lana Meeks
text: Nice place, clean grounds, good folks!

name: Carlos M. Fernandez
text:
UPDATE 6-11-21 This business is truly worthy of a ten (10) Star rating! Once again they have come through in a professional, technically competent, and competitively priced manner. I had the barrel of my 20 gauge shotgun cut down to the regulatory length for home defense (18.5") and it came out perfect. The weapon looks like it just came out of the box! Truly a professional and talented job by the resident gun smith's! Thank you to all. Your results may vary.

BREAK

Should be in the 10+ Star club! I was extremely impressed with my first interaction with your staff. Erin (Counter Lady) and Gerald (Gunsmith) pulled it together in a timely manner installing a P365 Safety Conversion Kit on my weapon. The work was done in minimal time resulting in me feeling much safer with 12+1 configuration. Customer service was without par, quality of the work was perfect and the pricing was very competitive. Wishing you guys the best in biz. Stay safe, be alert. Best. CMF sends...

name: Chris Knight
text:
I stopped in today to test fire a new mossberg 88 I picked up. Had a hard time finding ammo before I arrived, but they happened to have a couple boxes of ammo i could use.

The staff is friendly, courteous, and very informative. They take the time to explain what it takes to fire at the range with ease, and have a cushy waiting area to view a quick training video. The whole process was smooth and easy.

The range safety officers are well on their game. I felt safe the entire time on the range, and they were able to quickly explain the touch screen track interface, and further explaining that safety is a top priority.

I signed on for 30 minutes, and decided to fire my .40 before testing the shotgun. The touch screen interface has me sold on coming back to bullet and barrel. With just a click, the target goes the exact distance. Takes all the guesswork out of the experience.

I fired my pistol, and was pleased with the range itself. The design is new and clean. And with the RSOs keeping an eye on everything, it's a great environment to enjoy your firearms.

I tried the 88, and it performed beautifully. I added some extra cushion due to a shoulder injury. For those that would ask, you can't shoot bird shot here. But you can fire buck shot and slugs. But I'll tell you, it's fun firing a shotgun at this range.

Afterward I wandered around and struck up conversations with some of the staff, and showed me a selection for sale. I was impressed with the inventory, as well as pricing. I see myself buying my next firearm from here.

For me, it's a bit of a drive from Madison. But good business is where you find it, and Bullet and Barrel is my newest one stop shop for all things firearms. Plus, open on Sunday!

Dont take my word for it, stop in and check them out today! I'll be back soon, keep up the good work guys.

resp.text: Thank you for coming down! Please come back soon and....May the force be with you ;)

name: Karen Smith
text: State of the art range! The employees are always friendly and helpful - from the sales team to the RSOs! Everyone is very professional and committed to ensuring the safety of everyone who walks through the doors. I would absolutely recommend this place to any of my friends or family without hesitation!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Please come back soon!

name: JonPaul Wise
text: I recently moved to Huntsville and wanted to find a new class 3 place to call my "local shop". This place is a perfect example of how to do things right, treated me like I was a long time customer right from the start and after just a few visits I feel like I've been coming here for years. Very veteran friendly and the facility is far beyond just a gun shop. I've lived in 8 cities over 5 states in the past 10 years and this place is on the top without a doubt!

name: Justin W (JdogAwesome)
text: Extremely well maintained and high quality range! The firearm rentals where great and the guns where in pristine condition! The range officers where super nice and helped us a ton as it was my first time using a pistol. Can't recommend this place enough!

name: Adrian Farrales
text: Bullet and Barrel is a great place! They have a wide selection of firearms and a very nice indoor range, but what I like most about this place is that they offer excellent classes relating to firearms. Jeff is one of the staff members there and he is a great teacher. The folks working at Bullet and Barrel are experts and they'll make sure you get everything right. If you're looking for instructional classes on anything related to firearms, then Bullet and Barrel is definitely the place!

name: Lynn Watts
text: Took the handgun cleaning class with Jeff.  It was very informative.  I learned how to disassemble, clean and reassemble a firearm.  The tip about the grease was especially good since I have trouble at times with pulling the slide.  Thanks for the exceptional training.

name: David Norg
text:
Needed my scope mounted on a new rifle.
Made the mistake of taking it to another popular local business to get it done. Clearly was not a professional installation.
Gerald with Bullet and Barrel reinstalled the scope and rings on the spot and did it right!
Great people and service!

name: Carrie Givens
text:
I just made the best investment today, my new Wilson combat edcx9l firearm and I love It. Jeff was extremely helpful and the experience was awesome. I just started taking classes, and Jeff made sure I knew everything that I needed to know about the firearm before I left. He was very patient, considerate, and knowledgeable. Thank you Jeff, you’re awesome!
- C T Davis

name: Marquiz Liner
text: Can’t recommend Bullet and Barrel enough! The staff is very knowledgeable and extremely helpful! The range is clean, well-maintained, and well-managed by the excellent RSOs. Everyone we’ve encountered has been super nice! If you’ve never been, I highly recommend you check them out! They’re awesome!

name: Telia Norg
text: Just had a scope remounted correctly.  Took to another gun shop and they apparently had no idea what they were doing. As soon as we showed the clerk the firearm he immediately knew what was wrong. This is our place from now on.  Thanks

name: Hilary Crimmins
text:
Nice clean and well ventilated facility.
But honestly it is overpriced, and has extremely long waits. Members get preference and can be observed jumping the line before non-members for range access. I've even had a staff member tell me that they only had 4 boxes of ammo left and would only sell to members.
Today we, two of us for one lane, arrived at 2:15pm and paid for 30 minutes on the range. We waited well over 2 hours and did not get our full 30 minutes because they were closing. It's not worth it.

resp.text: We totally understand the frustration. We were extremely busy today as I'm sure you saw! With everything going on in the firearm industry we are trying to do everything we can. But we do have members who pay a monthly fee and part of that benefit is jumping the line. Kind of like Disney! We would love for you to give us another opportunity. Please reach out to me, Louis, at 256-384-4867 and we will make sure you have a 5 star experience

name: Joyce Maxwell
text: Had a wonderful experience Saturday with my daughter's. Took a class with Tommy, can't say enough about his wonderful teaching skills. We were nervous but with Tommy's great personality it wasn't long till we were calm and enjoying ourselves. Thank you so very much. We'll definitely be back!!

name: Andrew Emmerton
text: I took a private lesson with Jeff and he was very knowledgeable, I highly recommend taking a lesson. The rest of the staff were also great and they have a great selection of firearms for sale as well as some to rent for their indoor range.

name: Chad Jones
text: Louis and the crew at bullet and Barrel are first rate and so is their facility.  I've had some minor gunsmithing done as well, mainly to check suppressor alignment and get a few breaks lockset on, service has been fast and very affordable.  I've had a few problematic firearms inspected as well and John, their gunsmith, has always been straight forward and accurate.  Of the range facilities in the area, BnB stands head and shoulders above the rest.  I have range passes to go to other ranges for free, but I would rather spend some money at BnB to be with a better crowd and make sure their level of commitment to the average gun owner is rewarded.  When it comes to stores that are in your corner as a gun owner, these guys are bar none best of the best in our area.

name: pauline bracken
text: Sarah did a fantastic job teaching me how to firearm! I actually would give her 10 ⭐️ Since I haven’t in years!! I probably will take another class before I actually buy a pistol! Thank you again for your patience and spending over 2 hours with me! I had a wonderful time!!

name: Catherine Stower
text: Sarah was a wonderful instructor!  Her patience went above and beyond what I would have expected from an instructor, and her knowledge is tremendous.  In addition, she is continuing to work with me to help me figure out the best firearm for personal use.

name: Steven Gaffin
text:
I went because I was having the hardest time removing the retaining pin from the firing pin of my Remington 870. So I took the bolt down to Bullet and Barrel. Front Desk (not really front more like back left corner) staff was very welcoming and friendly. The gunsmith was able to remove the pin and lathe down a manufacturing defect in it that was keeping it in the bolt.
I was very satisfied and impressed with Bullet and Barrel and will definitely return for the many other services they offer.

name: Chad Jones
text: Louis and the crew at bullet and Barrel are first rate and so is their facility.  I've had some minor gunsmithing done as well, mainly to check suppressor alignment and get a few breaks lockset on, service has been fast and very affordable.  I've had a few problematic firearms inspected as well and John, their gunsmith, has always been straight forward and accurate.  Of the range facilities in the area, BnB stands head and shoulders above the rest.  I have range passes to go to other ranges for free, but I would rather spend some money at BnB to be with a better crowd and make sure their level of commitment to the average gun owner is rewarded.  When it comes to stores that are in your corner as a gun owner, these guys are bar none best of the best in our area.

name: pauline bracken
text: Sarah did a fantastic job teaching me how to firearm! I actually would give her 10 ⭐️ Since I haven’t in years!! I probably will take another class before I actually buy a pistol! Thank you again for your patience and spending over 2 hours with me! I had a wonderful time!!

name: Steven Gaffin
text:
I went because I was having the hardest time removing the retaining pin from the firing pin of my Remington 870. So I took the bolt down to Bullet and Barrel. Front Desk (not really front more like back left corner) staff was very welcoming and friendly. The gunsmith was able to remove the pin and lathe down a manufacturing defect in it that was keeping it in the bolt.
I was very satisfied and impressed with Bullet and Barrel and will definitely return for the many other services they offer.

name: Catherine Stower
text: Sarah was a wonderful instructor!  Her patience went above and beyond what I would have expected from an instructor, and her knowledge is tremendous.  In addition, she is continuing to work with me to help me figure out the best firearm for personal use.

name: MaryAnn Green
text: Took a beginner's gun safety class.  Sarah was my instructor and was extremely knowlegeable.  She answered all my questions and gave me good advise on how to properly handle a fire arm.  She provided helpful hints on the firing range.  I plan on meeting with her again for more instruction.

name: Steve S
text: Excellent instruction and advice from Jeff White! He is extremely knowledgeable and taught me a ton of tips to correct my technique. Thank you so much! It's just a great facility. Clean, professional, helpful.

name: Ethan Brewer
text: Alberto is the man. Great customer service. We talked about many different guns. He knew the product, and I could tell he was genuinely trying to help me.

name: Eugene Mayo
text: My first visit to Bullet & Barrel was a very pleasant experience. I expected the normal indoor gun range with no frills and a lack of management personnel for the amount of customers. Not at Bullet & Barrel! You enter the establishment and find yourself in a first class gun store with very tastefully displayed products. When you check in to the range most of the paper work is done electronically and there are plenty of well trained staff on hand to help you, not only at check in but on the range also. Defiantly not a Mom & Pops business. Top notch!

name: J Cowan
text: Great place for learning how to shoot or just for practice. My husband and I visited and enjoyed it. Truly learned at lot from our instructor Sarah. She was very knowledgeable and very patient. We learned so much. She walked through every detail with us together and separately, as we each own two different guns. Highly recommend! Thank you Sarah!! We will be back.

name: Dorothy Loftin
text: Thank you Tim for a great lesson on learning to get comfortable with a gun! I was with my sister and friend, both of whom had experience with guns.  Tim tailored the class for all 3 of us with varying abilities.  I had never touched a gun and was shooting with multiple guns by the end of the session.  The best part of it all is now I’m comfortable with the gun we have in our home.  Thanks again Tim!  We will definitely be back for more lessons!

name: Randy Chavez
text: Went in the is morning for the first time to sight in my hunting rifles. WOW!  Got hooked up with George and he did it all. Helped me sight in four rifles is one hour, explained everything he was adjusting and just made the experience unbelievable. Couldn't have asked for anything more. Thanks George!

name: Emilee Taritero
text: My twins took the Youth Marksmanship Class  with Sarah as part of their 13th bday weekend. She was amazing! She was so patient with the group of kids. She explained everything very well and made sure the class understood all the points of gun safety and operation which allowed them to have an amazing time once they got the hands on experience on the range. My twins DID NOT want to leave.  We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Thank you do much!!! Sarah is a great instructor! Please come visit us again soon!

name: vivaswanth c
text:
Great range. Courteous people and very encouraging trainers.
Modern equipment and look. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! Please come back and visit soon :)

name: Nelly Belly
text: Best range in Huntsville.... and it’s not even close. I became a member when they were still building it because I knew it would be a great place and they have exceeded my expectations. The ranges are well lit and spotless. The thickness of the barriers between the ranges was a major selling point to me. I feel safe and secure when I am on my lane. The range masters are helpful and add another layer of protection for the customers/ members that are throwing lead at a target. I strongly suggest you give Bullet and Barrel a shot (pun intended) if you are looking for a place to shoot. Beware, this place can become addictive.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We appreciate your continued support

name: diane rigsby
text: A friend and I took the first steps class from instructor Sarah.  Sarah gave great instruction emphasizing safety first.  She was very patient.  I learned A lot and will go back in the future.  Also the facility was very clean.

name: Jasmine Tucker
text: If you’ve heard about this place and have not stop by, WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? This place is awesome! It’s clean, and there’s safety videos which made me feel safe and my favorite part was that the staff made me feel comfortable. I encountered Sarah who is so patient and knowledgeable. This was my first time using my new .380 and she encouraged me to practice more with it and not be discouraged. Just when I thought the place couldn’t get any better I even had the same experience as I exited by Pam she’s so sweet she explained to me about how to become a member. This place sells everything too!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!! Please come back soon 😃

name: Larry Parker
text: Excellent facility. Great instruction on gun safety and usage from Jeff White. Highly recommend Jeff for a private or group lesson.

resp.text: Jeff does an awesome job!!!! Please come visit us again soon!!! And let us know if we can help you further

name: Ivica Ristovski
text: This is a very good place. Staff is super nice. Clean building, very nice shooting range. I would say best in town. Perfect for pistol shooting.

resp.text: Thank you!! All of lanes are also rifle rated as well!

name: Clint Beavers
text: The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly. Sarah answered all my questions, demonstrated gun safety, and made my first time experience an enjoyable one.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!!! Sarah is a great part of the team! Please come see us again soon

name: Zachary Talley
text: This is the best gun shop in Alabama. Fastest and most professional service. I dropped my gun off with new scope John amd Alberto had all the necessary mounting hardware in stock.  1 hour they mounted ,bore sighted and zeroed in at there 100 yard range. EXCELLENT SERVICE and very well trained gun smith and employees.

name: FryingPan
text: Got a membership to this place and its worth every penny. Excellent range officers and all very professional. The ranges themselves are very clean and ventilated. There is ample space for any weapons you want to bring. They have a huge selection of weapons to rent (free with membership) which was one of the big selling points of the membership for me. Once you shoot here you won't go anywhere else again.

resp.text: Thank so much! We appreciate you joining the family!

name: braxton guthrie
text: Extremely respectful over the phone was very refreshing, normally because of my age (21) I'm in between being treated as an adult and an adult.

name: david schachle
text: If you are looking to learn how to shoot, I highly reccomend Jeff. He is very nice and profesional. They have a clean range and store. Very fun experience.

name: Bryson Hill
text:
After going to three other places in Huntsville and the big box store across from Bridge street that has the street named after them along with there sales add and waiting in line for hour two find out that they did not have one or ever had one.
For now on Bullet and Barrel has my business best prices in town Thomas was my sales person he was a great help . Everyone was very nice I encourage anyone that is in the market for firearm visit Bullet and Barrel

name: donald reimer
text: Very clean, safe and very nice range people are very helpful and friendly no attitude will definitely return when back in town

resp.text: Come back and see us! Travel safe

name: Charles Pruitt
text: The staff is friendly and knowledgeable, and the gun range is awesome. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, if you're looking for a place to shoot, try them out. They've definitely earned my business.

name: Galvin Freeman
text: First visit here to shoot and I was very, very impressed with the entire staff from start to finish! This place has that it factor and has lots of potential to become a gem here in Huntsville! The indoor range takes it to another level. Definitely recommend checking this place out! You won't be disappointed! I enjoyed my visit and will be back.

resp.text: Please come back soon!

name: J B
text:
First, I must say that the range facilities are quite nice with helpful staff. The range facilities are up to date, very comfortable and the RSOs are very professional.

However, I made the mistake of using the gunsmith services. This has not gone well. This particular saga has been going on since the end of November. I always had to call or email them to get any status and the answer was always the same...it will be ready Saturday, it will be ready next week, it will be ready "sometime next week". I do not believe that they have devoted any significant time to my project. The first time I checked in with them after a week, that is when they informed me I needed to bring in other components. They never reached out to me. Very frustrating. Now that it is in Jan I have given up working with them and I am now taking the project somewhere else.

I get the feeling that they want to work on things when they feel like it, have no obligation to provide status or time estimate to the customer. Furthermore, I do not believe that they have fulltime gunsmiths which feels a little misleading from the website.

So if any readers know a professional, hardworking gunsmith in the area I am certainly looking!

resp.text: Hey JB! we're so sorry this was your experience. Normally our Gunsmiths can offer quick turn around times. Some thing may change that with parts availability and waiting on other parts we need from our customers. I am sorry we were back logged at the time and when we received your receiver in late December we began to diagnose the problem. But again that's no excuse for a lack of communication. Please let us know if we can be of further assistance

name: Andre Harris II
text:
Went to buy a light for my handgun and I received quick and friendly service. I was also lucky enough to receive a small discount while I was there.
Clean and an open environment also

name: Ethan Owens
text: A truly epic indoor shooting range. Truly the best in Alabama. Seriously. Plus I don’t have to worry about lead poisoning or negligent discharges by employees. They’re prices are really decent as well. Not the cheapest but well worth the price because of the great value they represent.

name: Sara Bozeman
text: Jerrell, the gunsmith, literally saved my weekend. I went in on a Friday needing to sight in a new rifle before going hunting for the weekend. My mounts were machines improperly and couldn’t hold a zero. Jerrell skipped his lunch to fix my mounts, and did an amazing job. The rest of the staff was very helpful, kind, and generous with advice. I love how clean and fresh the facilities are as well. Not many gun ranges are so well kept! I’ll be going back, and definitely using Jerrell for any work I need done on a gun.

resp.text: We love our gunsmiths!!! Please come back and see ya soon!  😀

name: Kenyon Stone
text: Such a great place! Staff very helpful and friendly. Brought a 12 year old, they had some options for her, and were making sure she enjoyed herself as well. Tim was a great help, felt very welcome

name: Caitlin Thomas
text: Such an enjoyable experience.  Highly recommend Bullet & Barrel

name: Destiny Freeman
text: We had such a great time here! Friendly, knowledgeable, and attentive staff. The range and facilities are very well maintained and clean. Wonderful range and personable people. Win win. Thank you!

name: DAN From the SOUTH
text: This is by far my favorite shooting range to use in Huntsville! Very friendly environment and extremely kid friendly. My son always says "Bullet and Barrel" when I ask him where he wants to go!! Well done guys!

resp.text: Thanks!!!! We like to think we're all a big family 😀😀😀

name: Matt Ray
text: No better place in Huntsville to buy a silencer.  You can even use it in the range while waiting on the government.  Silencer shop kiosk makes the process super simple, and the staff are excellent to work with.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Mike K
text: I took Louis up on his offer of a tour of Bullet and Barrel as my previous experience was less than stellar.  The experience this time was quite the opposite of my last visit; even before I met Louis.  I was greeted as soon as I entered the building and was pointed in the right direction to meet Louis.  The tour was thorough, and as suspected the facilities are top notch, and they offered quite a bit more than I expected.  The gun range is state of the art and the RSO's are extremely helpful.  The staff is friendly, professional and quite knowledgeable .  Thank you Louis, and the entire Bullet and Barrel staff for an exceptional experience.  I most definitely will be back.

resp.text: Mike, I am so sorry that this is what you experienced with us today. We pride ourselves on giving our customers an awesome experience. As our reviews reflect that this is not our norm. But I'd love to personally invite you back and I'll give you a behind the scenes tour of our facility. Thank you for the feedback and we truly hope we can deliver a 5-star response on you next visit. If you'd like to set this up my personal email is louis@bulletandbarrel.com~ Louis, General Manager

name: Rick Morgan
text:
Jason did an excellent job teaching me how to shoot. He caught and corrected all my aiming problems.
A really great teacher!

name: Thomas Webber
text: I have been to Bullet and Barrel many times. Always a great time and the staff treat you right. Best place in Huntsville!!!

name: Danta Simonsen
text: My son and I took a gun safety class and had a great time. The instructors were knowledgeable and made the class fun without loosing the seriousness of what we were there to learn. Tim took extra time to help my son making him feel confident. He was very encouraging no matter how bad my aim was. Excellent service, great facilitie. Highly recommend.

name: Michael Mauro
text: Hands down, the best Gun Range I've ever visited. I've lived across 5 states and have visited ranges in each one. This one has, by far, exceeded my expectations in all areas. The staff are immensely helpful, friendly and professional. Thank you for your clean facility and expert staff!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words!!!! And for bringing us some cool guns to work on~louis

name: Bridgette Bradley
text: We had our corporate event here. The employees were simply wonderful! Everyone was very knowledgeable and cared about each person in attendance. The facility is immaculate! The shooting range itself is the best in Huntsville. Highly recommend Bullet and Barrel!!

name: Jacob Boyett
text: Went in as a newbie shooter and within 2 minutes of being in the range Dave stepped up and immediately told me things I could correct and even went so far as to give me some drills to run. I would recommend Dave and B&B to anybody. See you guys next week!

name: Barrett Eimer
text: Great range to shoot at with nice lanes and technology; they have a decent selection of quality guns and rifles too. They also sell apparel for men and women.  It comes together as a welcome and unique blend of ideas for a place to shop.  There is a ton of space and it will be cool to see how they intend to make use of it all.

name: Weston Hall
text: What a fun professional place! Very clean and the staff was very friendly. They weren’t intimidating and was nice when I asked them questions.

resp.text: Thank you so much! Please visit us again soon!!

name: Ira Merritt
text: I have used the range at B&B  a number of times and the staff is always friendly, helpful, knowledgeable and safety conscious. I also recently did a trade and had gun smithing done on an AR. My interactions have all been very satisfactory. John, the gunsmith, and others went far out of their way to resolve a non-standard hardware problem in a way that I greatly appreciated. Great staff and operation.

name: Jay Graham
text: My wife and I shot guns for the first time. We had an excellent experience. We took a personal class from Colt, a fantastic instructor! He is very knowledgeable, explains things clearly, and kept us feeling confident throughout the entire process. We're already looking forward to our next visit.

name: Miki Heaton
text: First time to visit this range, very nice facility and clean well maintained range. I would have given it 5 stars if not for two things. When we walked in the door two employees behind the counter were on their cell phones and didn’t look up until we spoke. Then when we walked on the range the range officer was also on his phone. In each case neither were talking only looking at the screen.  I personally have a problem with employees being on their phones at work but on a firing range just seems like a really bad idea.

name: Will Booker
text: I drove all the way across town to get there still in line for 5-10 minutes they let two people in front of me go on to the range and then told me that they just took the last person on the range and turned me away. It wasn't covered related because they weren't busy. I won't be going back thanks for nothing

resp.text: Thank for leaving this feedback! As you can see typically the strong majority of our guests have 5 star experiences. Talking this over with our team we looked back at your trip. We do have a pretty firm rule on not allowing shooters on the range 30 minutes before we close. The folks who went ahead of you are some of our members and one of their perks is lane priority. We would absolutely love for you to give us another chance and I would like to invite you back as my guest and comp you your range time. ~Louis S.

name: Matt White
text: I am so happy with the experience I had shopping for my gun parts and my new purchase of the noveske space invader! They have answered every question that I have had. I usually give a name to ask for but theres no need in this best gun/shooting range in north alabama! Everyone is very knowledgeable. This place is amazing!

name: Matt Hamblin
text: Great staff and an amazing range. Oozes professionalism and safety. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Come visit us again soon

name: Ariel Eisenstadt
text: Lots of fun, friendly staff very helpful. Terrific selection of rental firearms very fair pricing

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! Please come visit us again soon and if there is anything we can do please let us know~Louis

name: Pat Shores
text: Great place to shoot!  Awesome service and staff especially the range officers.  They were both friendly and helpful all while being professional.  This was my first trip but it sure won’t be my last!

name: Seth Webb
text: These is the best range in North AL. The range is well lit, climate controlled, and each lane is very spacious. But the best part are the people who work here. I cannot give enough praise for my favorite place in Huntsville.

name: Ron Volinski
text: First time at a gun range. The staff was very helpful and accommodating.  Very nice place and the people are friendly and attentive.  Jason was really great with helping me with gun control and site alignment.  Great experience!

name: Caleb Hollingsworth
text: Never thought I would go to an indoor range again after a poor experience at Larry's range. The range here is nice and well lighted! Love it!

resp.text: Thank you! Come visit during the holidays!

name: tim watson
text: Nice and friendly staff. Clean and well run. Will definitely go there again.

resp.text: Thank you so much!!! Merry Christmas and we look forward to seeing you soon

name: alfred keely
text: The facilities are very nice, clean,  and comfortable. The staff are also very nice, and knowledgeable. It was an outstanding experience. My wife and I will be back.

name: Tom Copeland
text: Great place.Great people. Wouldn't think of going anywhere else.

name: Wayne Roddy
text: This a real nice place. The staff is very friendly, the decor and range is super clean.

resp.text: Thank you so much Wayne!!! Please come back soon

name: Mandi Harbour
text: Me && my husband went today and talked with a guy name Jeff. Let’s just say we WILL NOT be going back. He was rude and his costumer service was trash 🗑 this place won’t last long at all with the prices and the non friendly staff such as Jeff!

resp.text: I do apologise that this was your experience! This is so strange to hear because Jeff is one of our most lauded employees. Although we do apologise that we didn't meet your expectations I'd love to discuss your experience. Please call me on Tuesday at 256-384-4867 ~Louis GM

name: Jack Stripling
text: This place is awesome! Loved the rifle range. Great experience. I'll be back!

name: Anthony Williams
text: Came in looking for a gun that they had out of stock. One of the workers really helped me  out by looking for the weapon at other stores. Then helped me understand the paper work process. One thing that stuck out to me was friendly customer service and needs of the consumer met.

name: Louisa G
text: State of the art facility.  Super friendly and comfortable environment.

name: Paige Burchel
text: Precious ladies items - jackets, tees, hats, scarves, etc...not to be missed!

resp.text: Come again! We have a great sale going on!

name: Dean Hammer
text: Very clean place and helpful staff! Will return!

name: Dave Rausch
text: Well maintained facility & Staff

name: Jason Denny
text: You range does include a 100 yard range. However, put the fact that it is CLOSED ON MONDAYS on you site!!!  What a waste of time!

resp.text: Jason I am so sorry for the inconvenience. We are closed on Mondays so we can keep Bullet and Barrel to our high standard of a clean and safe range. However we do have our hours posted on our Website as well as here on Google and Facebook. But please come in tomorrow and we'll give you a 5 star experience

name: DM M (DMM)
text: Amazing!!

name: Susan Hoskins
text: Great place to visit!!!!!

name: Charlie Donner
text: Very nice
